text: Faithful is a 1910 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithFAITHFULFaithful and stars Arthur V. Johnson, Mack Sennett, Florence Barker, and Kate Bruce. ==Actors== *Arthur V. Johnson - John Dobbs *Mack Sennett - Zeke (Faithful) *Florence Barker - John's Sweetheart *Kate Bruce - Mother of John's Sweetheart ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1910 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Faithful (1910 movie)
